credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Four Scenes from Sericulture Series
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and grey wash, on two sheets of joined white paper
description: Upper left: Steaming silk worm cocoons and reeling the raw silk from the cocoons. Lower left: Gathering the mulberry leaves. Upper right: Spreading the leaves on the feeding trays. Lower right: Feeding mulberry leaves to the silkworms. Reverse: Leaves, notations, animal and trays of silkworms.
name: Drawing
